category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: PLMXML_Pre_Expand_BOP_Rule_Name
preference.preference_description: Specifies the name of a closure used to pre-expand process structures prior to a PLM XML export operation in the Manufacturing Process Planner application. Pre-expansion on large structures increases the performance of the command and reduces the load on the database server. If the preference is not set, no pre-expansion is done. Valid Values: Accepts a valid Teamcenter closure rule. Teamcenter supplies you with the PreExpandProcess closure rule to perform the pre-expansion.
